tuv.seg: Health services for pre-school children
Seirbhísí sláinte do leanaí réamhscoile
The Health Service Executive (HSE) provides a health screening service for pre-school children that is free of charge
Cuireann Feidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte (FSS) seirbhís scagthástála sláinte ar fáil do leanaí réamhscoile atá saor in aisce
This service may be provided at health centres
D’fhéadfaí an tseirbhís seo a chur ar fáil ag ionaid sláinte
Services for pre-school children are provided by public health nurses and Area Medical Officers that are employed by the HSE
Cuireann altraí sláinte poiblí agus Dochtúirí Oifigiúla Ceantair arna bhfostú ag FSS seirbhísí ar fáil do leanaí réamhscoile
All public health nurses take direct referrals from parents
Glacann gach altra sláinte poiblí le hatreorú díreach ó thuismitheoirí
Public health nurses are notified of all births in their area - either by the hospital where the birth occurred or by the midwife who was present for a home birth
Cuirtear altraí sláinte phoiblí ar an eolas faoi gach breith ina gceantar - tríd an ospidéal inar tharla an bhreith, nó tríd an mbean chabhrach a bhí i láthair do bhreith sa bhaile
Following the birth, your public health nurse will visit you and your child at home free of charge, usually within 72 hours of returning home from hospital
Tar éis na breithe, tabharfaidh an t-altra sláinte poiblí cuairt ort agus ar do leanbh sa bhaile, go hiondúil taobh istigh de 72 uair an chloig ón am a scaoiltear amach as an ospidéal tú
Public health nurses provide both general health and specific developmental advice to parents and monitor the development of the child
Cuireann altraí sláinte poiblí comhairle ar thuismitheoirí maidir le forbairt shainiúil agus sláinte ghinearálta agus déanann siad monatóireacht ar fhorbairt an linbh
A developmental examination is offered to every child by the Area Medical Officer at approximately 9 months, by appointment, in the local health centre
Cuireann an Dochtúir Oifigiúil Ceantair scrúdú forbartha ar fáil do gach leanbh nuair a bhíonn siad thart ar 9 mí d’aois, le coinne, san ionad sláinte áitiúil

This examination covers all aspects of the child's development, including hearing, sight, language development, physical development, etc, and is offered to infants irrespective of the family's income
Clúdaíonn an scrúdú seo gach gné d’fhorbairt an linbh, lena n-áirítear éisteacht, amharc, forbairt teanga, forbairt fisiciúil, srl, agus cuirtear ar fáil é beag beann ar ioncam an teaghlaigh
Problems that are identified at this examination may be treated free of chargeat out-patient hospital departments and any subsequent treatment is free as apublic patient
Féadfar cóireáil saor in aisce a dhéanamh maidir le haon fhadhbanna a aithnítear sa scrúdú seo i ranna othar seachtrach ospidéil agus tá aon chóireáil ina dhiaidh sin saor in aisce mar othar poiblí
In general, it is not necessary to apply for a developmental assessment for your child at 9 months as your Local Health Office routinely sends out the appointments
Go hiondúil, ní gá iarratas a dhéanamh ar mheasúnú forbartha dod’ leanbh ag 9 mí os rud é go seolann d’Oifig Sláinte Áitiúil na coinní amach
Most Local Health Offices offer additional doctor and public health nurse appointment clinics for those parents who have concerns about their child's development. Contact your local health centre
Cuireann formhór na nOifigí Sláinte Áitiúla clinicí coinne altra sláinte poiblí agus dochtúra breise ar fáil do thuismitheoirí a bhfuil imní orthu maidir le forbairt a linbh
